items.title: Lemon & Mint 100% Soy Wax Candle - 5.5oz - Everspring™
items.description: Get the fresh, crisp, clean scent of fragrant lemons along with the refreshing, cool notes from mint in the Lemon and Mint 100% Soy Wax Candle from Everspring. This candle is perfect in any space that needs a deodorizing, fragrance lift: the kitchen, bathroom, laundry or even an entryway to give a fresh, front-door welcome. This 5.5 oz. clean-burning candle is made with 100% natural essential oils and dye-free, plant-based soy wax for the utmost in good-for-you, natural air care. Poured in an attractive, thick, glass container with wooden lid, the candle complements any decor, any time of the year. Everspring Soy Wax Candles are made with you, your home and family in mind. Down-to-earth solutions that are up to Earth's standards. 100% satisfaction guaranteed. If you?re not satisfied with any Target Owned Brand item, return it within one year with a receipt for an exchange or a refund.
